title: ATLAS - CONTROLS ENGINE RECONCILIATION BEFORE EOD*1

task_list.instruction_title:
Validate the below controls and send results to [ CONTROLS ](#)  + PGU:



_- C5540 Forex Forwards : - Deal transfers with balance anomalies.
- C5560 Forex Forwards : - Deal transfers with other anomalies.
- C5580 Forex Forwards : - Deal transfers without anomalies.
- C5007 List of UBP current accounts issued of the SGPBS migration
- C5100 List of blocked positions
